entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers and flurries beginning in the morning then changing to flurries later in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
